name: exdistr2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(w0, w1)))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1)))))

stmt.origin: exbii(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(w0, w1))), wa(w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(w0, w1)))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1)))))
-| wb(wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(w0, w1))), wa(w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(w0, w1)))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1)))))
-| wb(wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(w0, w1))), wa(w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(w0, w1))), wa(w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(w0, w1)))), wex(s0, wa(w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1)))))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

comment: Distribution of existential quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-1995.)
